meanings.definition: A person who cuts miter joints.
meanings.sent1: The miterers in the workshop carefully measured and cut the corners.
meanings.sent2: The skilled miterers crafted perfect joints for the picture frame.
meanings.sent3: The miterers joked that their precision with angles made them 'corner-cutting experts'.
meanings.sent4: The miterers were like artists, sculpting wood into seamless connections.
meanings.sent5: The miterers' expertise in creating seamless joints was truly impressive.

meanings.sent1: At the construction site, the miterers worked on framing the windows with precision.
meanings.sent2: The furniture makers were skilled miterers, ensuring every corner was perfectly aligned.
meanings.sent3: The miterers proudly displayed their perfectly aligned corners as a badge of honor.
meanings.sent4: The miterers' attention to detail in creating sharp corners was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The miterers' corners were so precise, they seemed almost magical.

meanings.definition: Those who use a miter saw.
meanings.sent1: The carpenters, also known as miterers, used the miter saw to cut precise angles.
meanings.sent2: The miterers carefully operated the miter saw to create clean cuts for the project.
meanings.sent3: The miterers affectionately called their miter saw 'the angle master'.
meanings.sent4: The miterers' skill with the miter saw was evident in the flawless cuts they made.
meanings.sent5: The miterers' workshop echoed with the sound of the miter saw as they worked.
